Articles.Content:
I built a simple rover but when I put a Kerbal in it, I have no control. I had it attached to a command pod for testing at it works until I release the pod at which point it stops. I tried connecting it to other various devices and without a command core from a probe or pod, it simply does not work.

I pulled out several mods and it came back to life, working to figure out which one it is now and hopefully why.

EDIT: Never mind, it seems to be antenna range. I can only wager a guess as to why, but it's clear that whatever code it uses to deny control to probes that are not connected via relays is causing the seat to not function under the same circumstances.

Edited January 3, 2015 by Hyomoto
solved
